alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 8:29AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Florence, Georgetown, southwestern Horry, south central Marion and eastern Williamsburg Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 828 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pamplico to near Warsaw to 6 miles northeast of Huger. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, Georgetown, DeBordieu Colony, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Myrtle Beach Airport, Yawkey South Island, Murrells Inlet, Winyah Bay Entrance, Socastee, Red Hill, Garden City, Andrews, Johnsonville, Hemingway, Hickory Grove, North Santee, Rhems and Oatland. This includes SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg
